## ContextMenuRegistry namespace

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare namespace ContextMenuRegistry 
```

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ScopeType](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.scopetype.md) | Where this menu item should be rendered. If the menu item should be rendered in multiple scopes, e.g. on both a block and a workspace, it should be registered for each scope. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ActionContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.actioncontextmenuoption.md) | A representation of a normal, clickable menu item in contextmenu.ts. |
|  [ActionRegistryItem](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.actionregistryitem.md) | A representation of a normal, clickable menu item in the registry. |
|  [CoreContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.corecontextmenuoption.md) | Fields common to all context menu items as used by contextmenu.ts. |
|  [CoreRegistryItem](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.coreregistryitem.md) | Fields common to all context menu registry items. |
|  [LegacyContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.legacycontextmenuoption.md) | A subset of ContextMenuOption corresponding to what was publicly documented. ContextMenuOption should be preferred for new code. |
|  [Scope](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.scope.md) | The actual workspace/block/focused object where the menu is being rendered. This is passed to callback and displayText functions that depend on this information. |
|  [SeparatorContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.separatorcontextmenuoption.md) | A representation of a menu separator item in contextmenu.ts. |
|  [SeparatorRegistryItem](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.separatorregistryitem.md) | A representation of a menu separator item in the registry. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ContextMenuOption](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.contextmenuoption.md) | A menu item as presented to contextmenu.ts. |
|  [RegistryItem](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.registryitem.md) | A menu item as entered in the registry. |
